total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Determine the pattern of the output grid based on the examples given.
Q3: Identify the pattern of alternating 1s and 0s in the output grid.
Q4: Apply the pattern to the input grid to generate the output grid.
Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Create a new grid of the same size.
Q3: Fill the new grid with 1s.
Q4: Identify the cells in the new grid that are at even-numbered rows and columns.
Q5: Replace the cells identified in Q4 with 0s.
